verses.verse: A Song of the steps. O LORD, my heart is not exalted, nor are mine eyes lofty; Nor have I exercised myself in great things: nor in things too wonderful for me.
Had I not been humble, but exalted myself as a weaned child doth against its mother; how thou wouldst have retributed to my soul!
Let Israel hope in the Lord henceforth and forever.
